rules.name: blockCollisionCheckFix
rules.description: Fixes incorrect block collision checks for players

rules.name: blockUpdateOrderFix
rules.description: Fixes the issue where block updates are inconsistent due to directionality
extras: Warning! This changes how block updates are done and could effect some contraptions

rules.name: carpetFixesPreset
rules.description: This rule allows you to change all Carpet-Fixes rules at the same time!
extras: Vanilla: All rules set to there default value
CrashFix: Only rules that fix Crashes are enabled
Stability: Rules that make the game stable

rules.name: catsBreakLeadsDuringGiftFix
rules.description: Fixes cats sometimes breaking there leads after giving a gift

rules.name: chunkRegenFix
rules.description: Fixes Chunk Regen due to StringTag writeUTF() not respecting readUTF() Limits

rules.name: comparatorUpdateFix
rules.description: Fixes the issue where comparators don't always get updated correctly

rules.name: crystalExplodeOnExplodedFix
rules.description: End Crystals now explode when damaged from explosions. End Crystal chaining

rules.name: directionalBlockSlowdownFix
rules.description: Fixes movement slowdown being calculated based on last block in search. Uses the slowest value instead

rules.name: donkeyRidingDupeFix
rules.description: Re-introduces multiplayer donkey/llama dupe bug based on disconnecting while riding donkey/llama

rules.name: doubleRetraction
rules.description: Re-adds 1.8 double retraction to pistons
extras: Gives pistons the ability to double retract without side effects

rules.name: drownedEnchantedTridentsFix
rules.description: Makes enchantments work on tridents thrown by drowned

rules.name: drownedMemoryLeakFix
rules.description: Fixes Drowned navigation causing memory leak/performance degradation

rules.name: endVoidRingsFix
rules.description: Fixes the bug which causes there to be void rings (empty chunks) in the end

rules.name: endermanDontUpdateOnPlaceFix
rules.description: Fixes enderman not updating the block they place correctly

rules.name: fallingBlockDuplicationFix
rules.description: Fixes falling blocks duping using the end portal

rules.name: fallingBlocksCantUseNetherPortalsFix
rules.description: Fixes Falling Blocks not being able to go through nether portals

rules.name: hopperUpdateFix
rules.description: Makes it so that hoppers give block updates when placed while powered

rules.name: incorrectBounceLogicFix
rules.description: Fixes some entities not bouncing on slime blocks and getting stuck

rules.name: incorrectBubbleColumnLogicFix
rules.description: Fixes some entities getting stuck in bubble columns

rules.name: lightningKillsDropsFix
rules.description: Lightning kills the items that drop when lightning kills an entity
extras: Setting to true will prevent lightning from killing drops

rules.name: mountingFlyingTooLongFix
rules.description: Fixes getting kicked for flying too long when jumping and riding an entity

rules.name: oldFlintAndSteelBehavior
rules.description: Backport 1.12 flint and steel behavior. Flint and steel can be used for updating observers / buds

rules.name: petsBreakLeadsDuringReloadFix
rules.description: Fixes Leashed pets teleporting to the player when reloaded

rules.name: pistonDupingFix
rules.description: Disable TNT, carpet and part of rail dupers
extras: Attachment block update based dupers will do nothing and redstone component update based dupers can no longer keep their duped block
Implementation by Carpet-TIS-Addition - Dupe bad dig good

rules.name: portalGeneralItemDupeFix
rules.description: Fixes general item dupe using dolphins, and some other dimension change dupes

rules.name: railDuplicationFix
rules.description: Fixes rails duplicating

rules.name: railInvalidUpdateOnPushFix
rules.description: Fixes rails updating other rails before checking if they are in a valid location

rules.name: railMissingUpdateAfterPushFix
rules.description: Fixes rails not updating other rails after being moved

rules.name: railMissingUpdateOnPushFix
rules.description: Fixes rails not updating other rails on being moved, allowing for invalid states

rules.name: repairCostItemNotStackingFix
rules.description: Fixes Named Blocks not stacking due to useless RepairCost tag

rules.name: repeaterPriorityFix
rules.description: Quick pulses won't get lost in repeater setups

rules.name: shulkerBoxItemsDropContents
rules.description: Backport dropping the contents of a Shulker Box item when its item entity is destroyed

rules.name: shulkerTeleportFix
rules.description: Shulkers do not teleport correctly when going through a portal.

rules.name: sleepingDelaysFallDamageFix
rules.description: Fixes fall damage being delayed by sleeping, fall damage will be removed instead

rules.name: spawnChunkEntitiesUnloadingFix
rules.description: Fixes Spawn Chunks not ticking entities and block entities if no player online

rules.name: spongeUpdateFix
rules.description: Makes it so that sponges give block updates when absorbing water

rules.name: targetBlockPermanentlyPoweredFix
rules.description: Fixes target blocks being permanently powered when moved by pistons

rules.name: tntCantUseNetherPortalsFix
rules.description: Fixes TNT Entity not being able to go through nether portals

rules.name: worldgenIncorrectOrderFix
rules.description: Fixes World Modifying tasks to be before decorations [lakes]
extras: Warning! This is extremely unstable and modifies vanilla mechanics. Should be enabled before stating the server!

rules.name: zombiePiglinTracingFix
rules.description: Tracing the target to another dimension does not stop checking for visibility, so that many unnecessary chunks are loaded
